2702.verse: وَقُل|And say,|78|90|2709$رَّبِّ|`My Lord,|85|109|7$أَنزِلْنِى|cause me to land|134|158|12268$مُنزَلاً|(at) a landing place|150|174|12269$مُّبَارَكًا|blessed,|84|108|3106$وَأَنتَ|and You|74|86|5375$خَيْرُ|(are) the Best|114|281|2918$ٱلْمُنزِلِينَ|(of) those who cause to land.'"|227|394|9101$

2706.verse: وَقَالَ|And said|76|90|1089$ٱلْمَلَأُ|the chiefs|86|115|6487$مِن|of|50|79|53$قَوْمِهِ|his people|86|115|5784$ٱلَّذِينَ|who|70|99|20$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieved|92|121|59$وَكَذَّبُواْ|and denied|92|106|407$بِلِقَآءِ|(the) meeting|111|125|5524$ٱلْأَخِرَةِ|(of) the Hereafter,|144|172|978$وَأَتْرَفْنَـٰهُمْ|while We had given them luxury|230|258|12273$فِى|in|48|76|89$ٱلْحَيَوٲةِ|the life|82|96|817$ٱلدُّنْيَا|(of) the world,|117|129|818$مَا|"Not|48|72|262$هَـٰذَآ|(is) this|71|95|248$إِلَّا|but|42|66|86$بَشَرٌ|a man|61|85|2873$مِّثْلُكُمْ|like you.|75|99|9543$يَأْكُلُ|He eats|71|95|8093$مِمَّا|of what|71|83|216$تَأْكُلُونَ|you eat|86|115|2892$مِنْهُ|[from it],|80|138|571$وَيَشْرَبُ|and he drinks|108|166|12274$مِمَّا|of what|71|128|216$تَشْرَبُونَ|you drink.|100|129|12275$

2707.verse: وَلَئِنْ|And surely if|102|127|1309$أَطَعْتُم|you obey|81|131|12276$بَشَرًا|a man|68|118|8435$مِّثْلَكُمْ|like you,|75|125|12277$إِنَّكُمْ|indeed, you|97|147|514$إِذًا|then|50|75|1317$لَّخَـٰسِرُونَ|surely (will be) losers.|165|165|6617$

2708.verse: أَيَعِدُكُمْ|Does he promise you -|169|181|12278$أَنَّكُمْ|that you|77|101|1632$إِذَا|when|55|79|1370$مِتُّمْ|you are dead|107|131|12279$وَكُنتُمْ|and you become|129|153|290$تُرَابًا|dust|66|78|12280$وَعِظَـٰمًا|and bones|97|179|12281$أَنَّكُم|that you|77|241|1632$مُّخْرَجُونَ|(will be) brought forth?|173|255|12282$

2713.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|106|309$عَمَّا قَلِيلٍ|"After a little while|143|209|12286$لَّيُصْبِحُنَّ|surely they will become|175|241|12287$نَـٰدِمِينَ|regretful."|86|119|5049$

2714.verse: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ|So seized them|121|129|4598$ٱلصَّيْحَةُ|the awful cry|108|124|8594$بِٱلْحَقِّ|in truth,|78|94|692$فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ|and We made them|148|164|12288$غُثَآءً‌ۚ|(as) rubbish of dead leaves.|206|214|12289$فَبُعْدًا|So away|77|161|12290$لِّلْقَوْمِ|with the people -|135|302|8272$ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ|the wrongdoers.|128|212|377$

2701.verse: And when you have boarded the ship, you and those with you, then say, 'Praise to Allah who has saved us from the wrongdoing people.'

2702.verse: And say, 'My Lord, let me land at a blessed landing place, and You are the best to accommodate [us].' "

2703.verse: Indeed in that are signs, and indeed, We are ever testing [Our servants].

2704.verse: Then We produced after them a generation of others.

2705.verse: And We sent among them a messenger from themselves, [saying], "Worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him; then will you not fear Him?"

2706.verse: And the eminent among his people who disbelieved and denied the meeting of the Hereafter while We had given them luxury in the worldly life said, "This is not but a man like yourselves. He eats of that from which you eat and drinks of what you drink.

2707.verse: And if you should obey a man like yourselves, indeed, you would then be losers.

2708.verse: Does he promise you that when you have died and become dust and bones that you will be brought forth [once more]?

2709.verse: How far, how far, is that which you are promised.

2710.verse: Life is not but our worldly life - we die and live, but we will not be resurrected.

2711.verse: He is not but a man who has invented a lie about Allah, and we will not believe him."

2712.verse: He said, "My Lord, support me because they have denied me."

2713.verse: [Allah] said, "After a little, they will surely become regretful."

2714.verse: So the shriek seized them in truth, and We made them as [plant] stubble. Then away with the wrongdoing people.

2715.verse: Then We produced after them other generations.
